title: Dr. Psycho – Die Bösen, die Bullen, meine Frau und ich
resume: Dr. Psycho – Die Bösen, die Bullen, meine Frau und ich is a German language crime comedy television series. It was broadcast from March to May 2007 by the German private channel ProSieben and has been renewed for a second season.
